entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 after midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023
